snippet: Student Opinion | Tell us what you'd do with unused space at a mall in your community.
abstract: Student Opinion | Tell us what you'd do with unused space at a mall in your community.
lead_paragraph: What's your favorite mall? Has it suffered during the recent economic crisis, with vacant areas replacing favorite stores? What would you do if you had the chance to "make over" a mall that has more space than tenants? Read a related article for ideas, then re-imagine how that space could be used while the economy recovers.

headline.main: How Would You Make Over Your Mall?
